mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.f_id AS "fId", a.dzl_id AS "dzlId", a.counts AS "counts", a.customer_no AS "customerNo", a.stock_counts AS "stockCounts", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.select:
SELECT obom.bom_name, obom.bom_type, oo.product_no, oo.outgo_order_no, oo.order_no, od.counts, od.stock_counts, oo.customer_no, sc.customer_name, od.create_date FROM smt_order_outgo_dzl od left join smt_order_dzlbom obom on od.dzl_id=obom.id left join smt_order_outgo oo on od.f_id =oo.id left join smt_sys_customer sc on oo.customer_no=sc.customer_no
od.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL}
and oo.customer_no LIKE '%${customerNo}%'
and obom.bom_name LIKE '%${bomName}%'
and oo.order_no LIKE '%${orderNo}%'
and oo.product_no LIKE '%${productNo}%'
and oo.outgo_order_no LIKE '%${outgoOrderNo}%'
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
ORDER BY od.update_date DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO smt_order_outgo_dzl( f_id, dzl_id, counts, customer_no, stock_counts, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{fId}, #{dzlId}, #{counts}, #{customerNo}, #{stockCounts}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE smt_order_outgo_dzl SET f_id = #{fId}, dzl_id = #{dzlId}, counts = #{counts}, customer_no = #{customerNo}, stock_counts = #{stockCounts}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
